Description: Bright, Spacious, Graduate Student Friendly, 2nd floor, 2BR/1BA Brighton Duplex! This unit features an open floor plan, High ceilings and lots of natural light, living/dining room, exposed brick, decorative fireplace, two large, equal bedrooms with ample closet space, a modern bath, a modern, fully applianced, eat-in kitchen with granite counters, microwave, dishwasher, disposal, and ample storage, back porch/outdoor space, and laundry on site!
